Key Match Events: Ildemaro Vargas hit a game-winning two-run single in the ninth inning
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Dave Martinez praised Ildemaro Vargas's ability to work good at-bats
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was the first time in Nationals or Expos history that the team swept the Pirates in a doubleheader
Others: Kyle Finnegan recorded two saves in the doubleheader
